content.rendered:
My Skills

Skills and tools that I have multiple years of experience with and have used myself on client projects.

Configuration
  • Workflow
    • Flow
    • Process Builder
    • Workflow Rules
    • Approval Processes
  • Custom Objects
  • Custom Fields
  • Validation Rules
  • Products & Pricebooks
  • Web-2-Lead/Web-2-Case
  • Collaborative & Customizable Forecasting
  • Enterprise Territory Management
  • Business Processes (Sales & Support)
  • Communities
    • Visualforce & Apex
    • Lightning Templates
  • Live Agent
  • Solutions
  • Knowledge
  • Questions
  • Chatter
  • Field Service Lightning
  • Partner Portal
  • Work.com
Process
  • Business Process Mapping
  • Process Design
  • Training
  • Agile
    • Kaban
    • Scrum
Other Applications
  • MS Office
  • Visio
  • Lucidchart
  • Google Docs Suite
  • Google Analytics
  • Google Search Console
  • WordPress
  • Windows/OSX/Linux
  • VS Code
  • Git
  • GitHub, BitBucket
  • Heroku
  • Salesforce DX
  • Salesforce CLI
  • Anypoint Studio
  • Zoom
  • GearSest
Development
  • Lightning Components
  • Lightning Design System
  • Lightning Community Themes
  • Custom Settings
  • Custom Metadata Types
  • Apex Classes
    • Utility classes for migration from triggers
    • Custom Visualforce Controllers
    • Flow Actions
    • Flow Screen Components
    • External Services with Flows
  • Apex Data Types
  • REST, SOAP, Web Services
  • Apex Triggers
    • Bulkification of existing triggers
    • Migration to single trigger per object
  • Visualforce Components
  • Visualforce Pages
    • Inline
    • Replace out-of-the-box
Change Management
  • Release Schedule
  • Governance Board
  • Sandbox Management
  • Change Tracking
  • Deployment Management
  • Testing
  • Training
    • Internal, End Use, Train the Trainer
Apps
  • Eloqua
  • Marketo
  • Conga Composer
  • Conga Conductor
  • DocuSign
  • Drawloop
  • Conga Contracts for Salesforce
  • Zuora
  • Chargent
  • OneSource
Clouds
  • Sales Cloud
  • Service Cloud
  • Experience Cloud
  • Salesforce CMS
  • Financial Services Cloud
  • Non Profit, HEDA
  • Salesforce Platform
  • External Identity
  • Mulesoft

jetpack-related-posts.title: Automation Hour w/ Meighan Brodkey Custom Rollup Summary Fields
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Meighan Brodkey presents a great session on Rollup Summary Fields with Lookups. Meighan takes the standard "Rollup" mentality to the next level with dynamic rollups based on what type of record is connected to the record. An awesome scenario that can show you how to take your automation to the…

jetpack-related-posts.title: DFW SFDUG: Slack Development w/Meighan Brodkey
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Come listen to one of Accenture's top minds on Salesforce/Slack Integration, Meighan Brodkey. She will share all that's usable, new and upcoming around Slack.
